sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-modal v-model="showModal" title="Add/Edit Subscriber" @ok="handleOk" @cancel="handleCancel">
    <b-form @submit.stop.prevent="handleOk">
      <b-form-group label="Name">
        <b-form-input v-model="subscriber.name" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Registration Number">
        <b-form-input v-model="subscriber.registration_number" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Address">
        <b-form-input v-model="subscriber.address"></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <!-- Add other fields as necessary -->
    </b-form>
  </b-modal>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    showModal: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: true,
    },
    subscriber: {
      type: Object,
      required: true,
    },
  },
  methods: {
    handleOk() {
      this.$emit('save', this.subscriber);
    },
    handleCancel() {
      this.$emit('cancel');
    },
  },
};
</script>
